body_html:
Samsung Galaxy A3 comes by default with Android 4.4.4.

And it seems that the ImageUtils.convertYUV420ToARGB8888 function that makes the conversion from raw camera output to RGB format isn't compatible with versions of Android < 5.1.1 due to a bug on android

See issues #4911 and #306

So the solution is to update Android to +5.1.1, or adapt YUV2RGB function to this version of Android.
body_text:
Samsung Galaxy A3 comes by default with Android 4.4.4.
And it seems that the ImageUtils.convertYUV420ToARGB8888 function that makes the conversion from raw camera output to RGB format isn't compatible with versions of Android < 5.1.1 due to a bug on android
See issues #4911 and #306
So the solution is to update Android to +5.1.1, or adapt YUV2RGB function to this version of Android.
body:
Samsung Galaxy A3 comes by default with Android 4.4.4.

And it seems that the [ImageUtils.convertYUV420ToARGB8888](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/android/src/org/tensorflow/demo/TensorFlowImageListener.java#L164) function that makes the conversion from raw camera output to RGB format isn't compatible with versions of Android < 5.1.1 due to a [bug on android](https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=81984)

See issues [#4911](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/4911) and [#306](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/306)

So the solution is to update Android to +5.1.1, or adapt YUV2RGB function to this version of Android.
